statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = '12345'
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_temp > 30
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM device_info ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_value > 50;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type IN ('Temperature', 'Humidity') AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, status FROM device_info WHERE status = 'Active' AND location = 'Building A';
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, last_reading FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE location LIKE 'Room%';
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, location, last_reading FROM Sensors ORDER BY last_reading DESC;
SELECT Sensors.sensor_name, SensorReadings.reading_value, SensorReadings.reading_time FROM Sensors JOIN SensorReadings ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorReadings.sensor_id WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT s.sensor_name, a.alert_message, a.alert_time FROM Sensors s JOIN SensorAlerts a ON s.sensor_id = a.sensor_id WHERE a.alert_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM sensor_histories GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading FROM sensors WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM sensor_histories GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_reading > 30;

SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensors.sensor_type, sensor_histories.reading FROM sensors JOIN sensor_histories ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_histories.sensor_id WHERE sensor_histories.reading BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT devices.device_name, locations.location_name FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.location = locations.location_name;
SELECT * FROM Sensors LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM Sensors WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT d.device_name, l.location_name FROM Devices d JOIN Locations l ON d.device_location = l.location_id;
SELECT device_name, reading_value FROM Devices d JOIN DeviceData dd ON d.device_id = dd.device_id WHERE reading_value < 20;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM SensorData WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, Sensors.sensor_type, SensorData.reading_value, SensorData.timestamp FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE SensorData.reading_value < 20 AND Sensors.sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY SensorData.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Devices WHERE device_location = 'Living Room' AND device_name LIKE '%Thermostat%' ORDER BY device_name;

SELECT Locations.location_name, Locations.city, Sensors.sensor_type, SensorData.reading_value, SensorData.timestamp FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id INNER JOIN Devices ON Sensors.sensor_id = Devices.device_id INNER JOIN Locations ON Devices.device_location = Locations.location_id WHERE Locations.city = 'New York' ORDER BY SensorData.timestamp DESC;
